body.name: 12 Inch Traditional Sorghum Whisk Broom Handmade Multi -Surface Sweeping Driveways, Sidewalk, Remove Dust and Dirt from Porches

features: Sorghum broom stick is 12 inches long and the broom head is 1-1.5 inches wide, made of natural sorghum stick.
Sorghum brush is strong, flexible, and light weight, it’s easy to clean out the inside trash.
Sorghum broomstick is suitable for sweeping and dusting all kinds of floor, such as wooden floor, cement floor, stone floor, etc.
It’s also a good helper for housework, such as sweeping hair, sweeping dust, sweeping pet house, etc.
Sorghum brush with high quality, it’s durable and can be used for a long time.
body.description: Handcrafted Perfection: Our small duster brush brooms are painstakingly handmade by skilled artisans, ensuring precision and attention to detail in every brush. · Sustainable Materials: We prioritize sustainability by using natural and locally sourced materials in our duster brush brooms, aligning with non-toxic materials and reducing environmental impact. · Delicate Cleaning: Designed for precision, these small duster brush brooms are perfect for delicate and intricate cleaning tasks. Handmade Craftsmanship: Our 12-inch Sorghum Broom is a testament to the artistry of our skilled craftsmen. Each broom is meticulously handmade, ensuring exceptional quality and attention to detail Natural Sorghum Bristles: Crafted from 100% natural sorghum, the bristles of this broom are not only effective at sweeping away dirt and debris Durable and Long-Lasting: The natural sorghum bristles are known for their durability, providing long-lasting performance. This broom is designed to serve you well for years.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SKENNOVA - Simply the best broom handmade Handcrafted Perfection: Our small duster brush brooms are painstakingly handmade by skilled artisans, ensuring precision and attention to detail in every brush. We prioritize sustainability by using natural and locally sourced materials in our duster brush brooms, aligning with non-toxic materials and reducing environmental impact Delicate Cleaning: Designed for precision, these small duster brush brooms are perfect for delicate and intricate cleaning tasks, such as dusting shelves, decor, or electronics. Ergonomic Design: Our duster brushes feature an ergonomic handle for comfortable and effortless use, making your cleaning routine a breeze. Unique and Artistic: Each handmade duster brush is a unique piece of functional art, combining utility with aesthetics to elevate the beauty of your living spaces while maintaining cleanliness.

BAMBOO HANDLE Our Natural Wood House Broom is designed for your full comfort. It is Lightweight, Comfortable to use, and has a Long and Solid Wood or Bamboo Handle which is long enough for anyone to use. You can also use it with your own dustpan set. This is one of the best brooms for floor cleaning and is a safe sweeper not dangerous to your pet dog or toddler. Comfortable Bamboo Grass Handle: The ergonomic bamboo grass handle is not only aesthetically pleasing but also comfortable to hold. It ensures a secure grip, making your cleaning tasks efficient. Versatile 12-Inch Size: The 12-inch overall height of the broom is perfect for reaching tight spaces and corners that larger brooms might miss. Its versatility makes it an essential tool. Handcrafted Perfection: Our small duster brush brooms are painstakingly handmade by skilled artisans, ensuring precision and attention to detail in every brush. · Sustainable Materials: We prioritize sustainability by using natural and locally sourced materials in our duster brush brooms, aligning with non-toxic materials and reducing environmental impact. · Delicate Cleaning: Designed for precision, these small duster brush brooms are perfect for delicate and intricate cleaning tasks. Handmade Craftsmanship: Our 12-inch Sorghum Broom is a testament to the artistry of our skilled craftsmen. Each broom is meticulously handmade, ensuring exceptional quality and attention to detail Natural Sorghum Bristles: Crafted from 100% natural sorghum, the bristles of this broom are not only effective at sweeping away dirt and debris Durable and Long-Lasting: The natural sorghum bristles are known for their durability, providing long-lasting performance. This broom is designed to serve you well for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I first opened the package I thought to myself, WHAT!! Took it out of the package and believe me, this little broom looks great in my kitchen as decor + it really does clean! It’s really adorable 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional!!
reviews.reviewText: Got this little broom/brush to clean my incense ashes and sweep around my altar, and it's perfect! The size is cute and functional, the brush is flexible to catch everything and in all corners, I Love it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was what was expected
reviews.reviewText: I use this in my greenhouse to sweep the gravel where it dose not belong. Works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works fine
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for clean up wood chips or saw dust around a composting toilet. It’s sturdy and sweeps the chips just fine. Cute to look at and goes with the vintage theme too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Swept away Not😏
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed that it was not firm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy & work well
reviews.reviewText: I really like these little brooms. I have one in each of my vehicles & they work great for cleaning up in between full cleanings. The bristles are soft but not too soft. They're really handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If looking for a very flexible and soft broom, this is item. Don't expect to dig out tough debris out of car seats like standard wisk brooms.
